name: 30882515-3ce5-40a5-ae8c-83b1304b8d32
goal: To identify and manage high-risk emotional situations ethically and safely by providing immediate supportive messages and crisis resources.

steps.text: Respond empathetically and stay calm using ${TOOL:Empathetic Response Generator}.
Share verified helplines and emergency support resources.
Use ${TOOL:Hallucination Guard} to ensure all shared data is accurate.
Do not repeat safety prompts if the user has acknowledged them.
After confirming safety, proceed to ${PLAYBOOK:Closure Playbook}.
